section.title: Overview
section.para: The Admin Console provides you with a lot of information about your application. For example you can acces the data stored in the datastore or look at the log files of your application.
You can also use standard Java Logging for creating custom logs on the GAE/J. See Java Logging Tutorial and Logging on the GAE/J .
